job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pSolve Finance is an independent debt advisor transforming an industry built on leadgeneration and hidden cost business models We arent your typical fintech or findata company were building an interface for borrowing that works for users not their lenders So no referral fees or advice you cant rely on Instead we offer a simple plainfree shopping refinancing and monitoring hub that works for the user through aligned incentives we earn a tenth of what they saveppbrppWe are seeking talented Software Engineers to add to our team to help people save money on debt We are looking for missiondriven candidates who want to use their skills for meaningful and challenging work Join us in delivering back over 100 billion of savings per year into pockets of US householdsppbrppAs an early team member you will build out our systems front to back and everything in between We use Jamstack and leverage Google Cloud Platform serverless compute big data and AI capabilitiesppbrppWe are primarily a Javascript shop NodeReact but are always open to using the right tool for the job We take every opportunity to integrate a DevOps and DataOps philosophyppbrppOur values drive our interactions with users and each otherpolliOwnership and trust  we own key deliverables and trust teammates within their roleliliTransparency  we keep decision logs and the state of the company open to allliliBe smarter get smarter  we arent afraid of challenging the status quoliliEncourage diversity uniqueness and idiosyncrasyliliTake our mission seriously and ourselves lightlyliolpbrppYoull be joining a team with extensive household finance and FinTech experience a couple of PhDs a few software engineers product manager and operations managerppbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulli3 years of experience in modern programming languages with a preference for NodejsJSESlili3 years of experience contributing to architecture and design of software systemsliliExperience with public cloud services especially GCPliliExperience building and maintaining production software systemsliliExperience designing and consuming financial APIsliulpbrppstrongPreferred QualificationsstrongpulliExperience architecting and exploring technical tradeoffs and capabilities reliability scalingliliStartup mindset ownership and the appropriate balance of quality and urgencyliliInterest in mentoring teammates and growing into a leadership roleliulpbrppstrongBenefitsstrongppWe offer between 100k150k for Engineers based on experience and location plus participation in our equity plan Compensation bands for directorlevel candidates are available on request for qualified individualsppbrppWe are remote first We wont ask you to come back to the office We have hubs in Portland ME and NYC if youd like to cowork with other team members We offer 401k matching health vision and dental insuranceppbrppWe are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race color sex age national origin religion sexual orientation gender identity andor expression status as a veteran or basis of disability or any other federal state or local protected classp
